div.p: Know how to log into your Clever (Google EDU) Account. Your account is setup with the following defaults.

ul.li: Password: Date of birth in the m/dd/yyyy format (including slashes)

div.address: If you have any trouble logging in, please contact your Language Arts teacher or Office Manager who can submit a support ticket.

article.class: node node-teaser node-type-post node-25246 pt-show-date pt-show-social-block no-event-date t615 wt615 wt2 wt0 t406 wt406 wt77 wt0 t1348 wt1348 wt51 wt0 access-normal status-new has-more pt615 has-2-nt

a.title: Attention Parents and Students! AP 2019-20 Exams to be Available from Home
a.span: Attention Parents and Students! AP 2019-20 Exams to be Available from Home

div.p: We know that many of our students and our families are facing tremendous challenges because of this health crisis. Your health and safety is our top concern.

We also know our students worked hard all year long to get ready for the Advanced Placement (AP) Exams. We are excited to let you know that the College Board has developed a safe and secure way for students to take the exams remotely.

article.class: node node-teaser node-type-post node-25244 pt-show-date pt-show-social-block no-event-date t615 wt615 wt2 wt0 t406 wt406 wt77 wt0 t1574 wt1574 wt1573 wt1561 wt77 wt0 t1568 wt1568 wt406 wt77 wt0 t1348 wt1348 wt51 wt0 access-normal has-more pt615 has-4-nt

div.p: This Wednesday, April 22, Sac City Unified will distribute computers to families of high school students at the below schools only. We will offer a make-up day for other schools on another date.
We will distribute one (1) computer per family of high school students.

As additional computers are made available, we ultimately expect to provide each of our students with a computer, if they do not have a computer at home. As such, we will announce additional distribution dates soon.

article.class: node node-teaser node-type-post node-25240 pt-show-date pt-show-social-block no-event-date t615 wt615 wt2 wt0 t406 wt406 wt77 wt0 t1348 wt1348 wt51 wt0 access-normal has-more pt615 has-2-nt

a.title: Online Registration Begins for 2020-21 Academic Year for K-12 Students
a.span: Online Registration Begins for 2020-21 Academic Year for K-12 Students

div.p: Over the upcoming weeks, we will be announcing the re-opening of many district services that we traditionally provide our community. From distance learning to online enrollment to remote counseling, we are working diligently to offer our students the resources they need to achieve academic and social and emotional success. For students that are currently enrolled and have no changes, you do not need to submit a new application.

article.class: node node-teaser node-type-post node-25236 pt-show-date pt-show-social-block no-event-date t615 wt615 wt2 wt0 t406 wt406 wt77 wt0 t1348 wt1348 wt51 wt0 access-normal has-more pt615 has-2-nt

a.title: Updated Meal Service Days and Times for SCUSD Families
a.span: Updated Meal Service Days and Times for SCUSD Families

div.p: You can also view this information in Spanish, Vietnamese, Chinese, Hmong, and Russian.

article.class: node node-teaser node-type-post node-25233 pt-show-date pt-show-social-block no-event-date t615 wt615 wt2 wt0 t406 wt406 wt77 wt0 t1574 wt1574 wt1573 wt1561 wt77 wt0 t1568 wt1568 wt406 wt77 wt0 t1348 wt1348 wt51 wt0 access-normal has-more pt615 has-4-nt

div.p: This Friday, April 17, Sac City Unified will distribute computers to families of students in grades 7 and 8, as well as students who were unable to pick up a computer during prior computer distribution events.
We will distribute one (1) computer per family of students in grades 7 and 8.
As additional computers are made available, we ultimately expect to provide each of our students with a computer, if they do not have a computer at home.

p.strong: We will announce additional distribution dates for our high school students soon.

article.class: node node-teaser node-type-post node-24498 has-event-date t1227 wt1227 wt60 wt2 wt0 t1349 wt1349 wt51 wt0 access-normal no-more pt1227 has-1-nt

span.class: last meta-item post-date event-date upcoming first-upcoming

div.p: The Parent Information Exchange (P.I.E.) luncheon meetings offer a variety of presentational sessions for SCUSD parents, staff and community partners. The meetings are designed to create ever-growing partnerships with resources that will support the educational, health and emotional development of our families and students.
We are limited to 70 guests, please call to reserve your space at Serna Parent Resource Center (916) 643-7924

div.p: The meeting agenda will be posted the Friday prior to the Board Meeting.

This meeting of the Sacramento City School Board is being videotaped in its entirety and will be cablecast without interruption on Metro Cable 14, the government affairs channel on the Comcast and SureWest Cable Systems.

div.div:
Serna Center
Community Conference Rooms
5735 47th Avenue
Sacramento, CA 95824
